abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed highway project includes:
            (i) improvement of four road sections totalling about 34
            miles; (ii) supervision of improvement works by consultants;
            (iii) purchase and installation of vehicle weighbridges;
            (iv) feasibility studies by consultants of about 200 miles
            of national highways; (v) detailed engineering by
            consultants of about 100 miles of high priority roads
            resulting from the feasibility studies; (vi) consulting
            services to improve the organization and operations of the
            MWHS; and (vii) technical assistance by consultants to a
            central transport planning unit.
